definitions: the action of regarding something as being caused by a person or thing

examples.text: the electorate was disillusioned with his immediate attribution of the bombings to a separatist group

shortDefinitions: action of regarding something as being caused by person or thing

definitions: the action of ascribing a work or remark to a particular author, artist, or person

examples.text: the study of Constable is fraught with problems of attribution
the attribution to Mozart on the title page is correct
he bought pictures unseen, according to their attributions

shortDefinitions: action of ascribing a work or remark to particular author, artist, or speaker

definitions: the action of regarding a quality or feature as characteristic of or possessed by a person or thing

examples.text: the attribution of human emotions to inanimate objects
attributions of false motives, especially of greed, are commonplace

shortDefinitions: action of regarding quality or feature as characteristic of or possessed by person or thing
